section.title: Public mailing list
section.para: The public mailing list for general usage questions regarding DRBD is drbd-user@lists.linbit.com. This is a subscribers-only mailing list, you may subscribe at . A complete list archive is available at .

section.title: Commercial DRBD support
section.para: Commercial DRBD support, consultancy, and training services are available from the project's sponsor company, LINBIT.

section.title: Publications
section.para:
DRBD's authors have written and published a number of papers on DRBD in general, or a specific aspect of DRBD. Here is a short selection:
Lars Ellenberg
DRBD v8.0.x and beyond 2007 Available at
Philipp Reisner
DRBD v8 - Replicated Storage with Shared Disk Semantics 2007 Available at
Philipp Reisner
Rapid resynchronization for replicated storage 2006 Available at

listitem.para: Wikipedia keeps an entry on DRBD.
Florian Haas, one of the co-authors of this guide, maintains a blog.
Both the Linux-HA wiki and ClusterLabs have some useful information about utilizing DRBD in High Availability clusters.
